text: The 2021 Men's Asian Champions Trophy will be the sixth edition of the Men's Asian Champions Trophy, a field hockey tournament for the six best Asian national teams organized by the Asian Hockey Federation. It was originally scheduled to be held in from 17 to 27 November 2020 at the Maulana Bhasani Hockey Stadium in Dhaka, Bangladesh. In August 2020 the Asian Hockey Federation announced that the tournament would be postponed because of the COVID-19 pandemic in Asia to 2021 to be held from 11 to 19 March 2021. ==Teams== Alongside the hosts, Bangladesh, the following five teams will be participating. {|class="wikitable sortable" !Team !FIH Ranking !Appearance !Last appearance !Previous best performance |- |||||1st||None||Debut |- |||||6th||2018||1st (2011, 2016, 2018) |- |||||6th||2018||2nd (2013) |- |||||6th||2018||3rd (2011, 2012, 2013, 2016, 2018) |- |||||6th||2018||1st (2012, 2013, 2018) |- |||||4th||2018||4th (2016) |} ==See also== *2021 Women's Asian Champions Trophy ==References== Category:Men's Asian Champions Trophy Asian Champions Trophy Champions Trophy Category:International field hockey competitions hosted by Bangladesh Category:Sport in Dhaka Champions Trophy Category:21st century in Dhaka Asian Champions Trophy
title: 2021 Men's Asian Champions Trophy
